name: My Experiments in Python
body:
### This is my first GITHub page
I am hosting some of the stuff that I have done while learning Python.

These are some ideas that I want to expand on in the future(none of these are even nearly complete!).

Basically I'd like to make some tasks easier to accomplish from the command line itself.

Note: All the code is in Python 2.7
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
